document_data.name: Arleosa Starhenge
document_data.mainbody: '''Arleosa Starhenge''' was a tavern owner in [[Amphail (village)|Amphail]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]] in the {{YearlinkName|1485}}.
document_data.Description: Arleosa had gray hair and cleverly ironic sense of humor.
document_data.Abilities: She had the inborn ability to ''[[alter self]]'' a few times a day.
document_data.Possessions: In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]], she was the proprietor of the [[Stag-Horned Flagon]], a tavern in the village of Amphail. She had a magic [[ring]] made of wood and carved with cavorting [[nymph]]s. She was told that it would provide aid or advice if she spoke the name of its creator into the ring, but she never availed herself of this boon.
document_data.Relationships: Arleosa knew [[Miros Xelbrin]] from her years with a traveling carnival and they were still friends into retirement.
document_data.History: Arleosa was of Chondathan descent, born in an area infused with [[wild magic]] which apparently gave her a shapechanging ability. This ability led her to join a carnival and she traveled widely for many years. In the late 1480s or early 1490s, she settled in Amphail where she bought the Stag-Horned Flagon tavern and worked as a tavernmaster. No one in Amphail knew of her magical nature and she did not use her ability any more, having retired from that life.
